title: Can't choose ward skin in champion select blind pick
body: Title. It used to be there like a patch ago.

replies.body:
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}  


It does the same thing with my ward selection i cant click it

Hey BakedLotion - 

Would you happen to have a screenshot? Loading into blind pick, I see a ward selection box and I'm able to interact with it.
